response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession; it's a symbol of craftsmanship and excellence. I believe its true worth surpasses $800,000, but considering the current market conditions and my desire to find the right person who appreciates its true value, I am offering it to you at a special price. My offer to you is $750,000. I trust this proposal aligns with your expectations and values. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this exclusive offer.", "product_price": 750000}
